title: Platter
description: platter, blue and white ironstone; catalogued under pottery  platter with Chinese style \'Willow Pattern\' decor in transfer printed underglaze blue;  the mark is close to Walpoa mark used on Swansea pottery, Cf. Litchfield Pottery and Porcelain, p.359.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
